description: Theta series of hexagonal close-packing with respect to triangle between tetrahedra.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: S. K. K. Choi, A. V. Kumchev and R. Osburn, On sums of three squares, arXiv:math/0502007 [math.NT], 2005.
N. J. A. Sloane and B. K. Teo, Theta series and magic numbers for close-packed spherical clusters, J. Chem. Phys. 83 (1985) 6520-6534.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
